name: Unfold
description:
Here is my entry for the Ludum Dare 45 ! 

In Unfold, your play a bird and enter an old temple. The place is dusty, and there is nothing exept... eggs. Crack them open to reach the end of the temple and find out what it hides...

Controls :

- WASD = Move around

- Shift = Fly / Read

There are two versions (Music/No Music), the music on the music version is composed by Rolemusic : https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Rolemusic
